cells.data:
- [ ] Generate Pre-Signed Upload URL for S3
- [ ] Setup Celery processing job to poll video upload bucket for new videos
- [ ] Implement ability to generate transcoding jobs in a celery task
- [ ] Implement naming convention / account linking for processing and completed jobs.
- [ ] Listen to AWS SNS for - 'RankedEncodingDone' and 'RankedEncodingFailed'
- [ ] Pre-Signed URLs for AWS Posts (Check Boto)
- [ ] Link filename from /videos/upload to videos object.
